titleStmt.title: Free trade, or, The meanes to make trade florish. Wherein, the causes of the decay of trade in this kingdome are discouered and the remedies also to remooue the same are represented.
titleStmt.author: Misselden, Edward, fl. 1608-1654.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition with some addition.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legatt for Simon Waterson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
